response.original_title: Joined - The World of Siamese Twins - Part 2
response.overview: Follow Allison and David Lawler, a brave couple expecting the birth of their conjoined twin girls. Despite a challenging prognosis from top medical experts, who doubt the twins can be separated or survive long after birth, the Lawlers are holding onto hope and faith for a miracle.  In this heartwarming documentary, you'll witness the strength and resilience of parents facing the unknown. Allison and David have been told that their twins share a single heart, making separation impossible and survival uncertain. Yet, their story is one of unwavering belief and tireless research into similar cases where conjoined twins have defied the odds.  Watch as the Lawlers draw inspiration from miraculous stories like the Turner twins and the Chappelle twins, who overcame medical expectations to live full and healthy lives. Discover how their faith and determination keep them going, even in the face of overwhelming challenges.
response.title: Joined - The World of Siamese Twins - Part 2
